## Query class

The Query formatter based on RFC 3986.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Query 
```

## Example


```ts
Query.parse("key1=value1&key2=value2&key2=value3");
// {
//   pairs: Map([
//     ["key1", "value1"],
//     ["key2", ["value2", "value3"]],
//   ]),
// }
```
